mapper.select: /* findSchBySchmSeqAndSchSeq */ SELECT tss.SCHM_SEQ AS schmSeq, tss.SCH_SEQ AS schSeq, tss.SCH_TITLE AS schTitle, tss.SCH_CONTENT AS schContent, tss.START_DATE AS startDate, tss.END_DATE AS endDate, TSS.ALL_DAY_YN AS alldayYn, tss.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, tss.CREATE_SEQ AS createSeq, tss.MODIFY_DATE AS modifyDate, tss.MODIFY_SEQ AS modifySeq FROM t_sc_sch tss WHERE 1 = 1 AND tss.SCHM_SEQ = #{sch.schmSeq} AND tss.SCH_SEQ = #{sch.schSeq}
